content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) with 49 iron ore and 0 coal
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0) with 0 iron ore and 0 coal
- Furnace at position (4.0, 0.0) with 1 iron ore and 0 coal
- Furnace at position (6.0, 0.0) with 0 iron ore and 0 coal

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure the furnace has available inventory space before attempting to insert items. The error indicates that the furnace at position (0, 0) is full and cannot accept more coal.
- Check the current inventory of the furnace before inserting items to avoid inventory full errors.

### Errors when using coal
- Ensure that you have enough coal in your inventory to insert into the furnaces. The logs indicate multiple attempts to insert coal into furnaces that are already full or have insufficient space.

### General tips
- Regularly monitor the inventory of your furnaces and adjust your item insertion strategy accordingly to prevent full inventory errors.
